name: instLeftDistribClassOrderDual
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Mul α
inst✝ : Add α
h : LeftDistribClass α
⊢ LeftDistribClass (OrderDual α)
decl: instance [Mul α] [Add α] [h : LeftDistribClass α] : LeftDistribClass αᵒᵈ := h

name: instRightDistribClassOrderDual
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Mul α
inst✝ : Add α
h : RightDistribClass α
⊢ RightDistribClass (OrderDual α)
decl: instance [Mul α] [Add α] [h : RightDistribClass α] : RightDistribClass αᵒᵈ := h

name: instIsDomainOrderDual
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : Ring α
h : IsDomain α
⊢ IsDomain (OrderDual α)
decl: instance [Ring α] [h : IsDomain α] : IsDomain αᵒᵈ := h
